entries.message: We are currently experiencing a partial outage in our Dallas location. Our network engineers are actively working with our upstream providers to restore connectivity as quickly as possible.

Event Type: Service Degraded Performance and Availability

Our Cloud Native team is investigating a partial outage situation with our VKE infrastructure. The following services may be impacted by this event:

- Retrieving new copies of cluster kubeconfig files 

We are working quickly to restore service to its optimal state.

Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the Mumbai location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2025-06-10 18:30:00 UTC
End Time: 2025-06-11 00:30:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to reduce impact to customer infrastructure. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact, however, network reachability to Mumbai instances may be affected for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform this work. While itâ€™s important to be aware of start and end times of the maintenance window, due to our redundant network architecture, our engineers expect that you may see little to no impact at all while the work is performed.

Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the Atlanta location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2025-06-05 05:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2025-06-05 09:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to maintain our ideal hosting environment. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, Atlanta instances will be unreachable for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform network, firmware, or host upgrades.
